[id='connecting-to-amazon-sqs_{context}']
= Connecting to Amazon Simple Queue Service (SQS)
:context: sqs

An integration can retrieve messages from an Amazon SQS queue or 
send messages to an Amazon SQS queue. To do this, create an Amazon SQS
connection and then add that connection to an integration flow.
For details, see:

* xref:creating-amazon-sqs-connections_{context}[]
* xref:adding-amazon-sqs-connection-retrieve_{context}[]
* xref:adding-amazon-sqs-connection-send_{context}[]

include::../../modules/connecting/p_creating-amazon-sqs-connections.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

include::../../modules/connecting/p_adding-amazon-sqs-connection-retrieve.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

include::../../modules/connecting/p_adding-amazon-sqs-connection-send.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

:context: aws
